subject: Add generated_initial_description back to ticket_match
description:
Added generated_initial_description back to ticket_match across all 4 OpenSpec files.

Evidence:
- `proposal.md:46` - `| \`ticket_match\` | \`matched_id\`, \`ticket_matches_call_issue\`, \`is_new_issue\`, \`match_method\`, \`match_signals\`, \`generated_initial_description\` |`
- `design.md:327` - `## Decision: generated_initial_description in ticket_match`
- `design.md:309` - `| \`generated_initial_description\` | string/null | prompt-6 \`initial_description_from_call\` | CRM-ready ticket description synthesized from transcript. Populated only when \`is_new_issue\` is true. Null otherwise. |`
- `spec.md:283` - `#### Scenario: New issue generates initial description`
- `tasks.md:65` - `Fields: matched_id, ticket_matches_call_issue, is_new_issue, match_method, match_signals, generated_initial_description`
- Verification: grep for generated_initial_description across all 4 files confirms presence
